Sidrem

This is a constructed script I designed from doodling in classes. I later scanned and converted it to an SVG font using a Python script available in the Sidrem repo. The rule for constructing the font it that every letter must be a single continous non-intersecting line.

The text below is editable, so you can select and change it.

Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting by her sister on the bank and of having nothing to do once or twice she had peeped into the book her sister was reading but it had no pictures or conversations in it and what is the use of a book thought Alice without pictures or conversation
